top.title: WEDDING WEBSITE
top.text: Where you will save all your wedding memories forever, where you will choose your own personalized template, manage every event detail and let your guests share their pictures, videos and moments with you.

top.title: BUDGETER
top.text: Do you have a figure in mind? Place it in the budgeter and we will provide you with all the choices and possibilities you can think of.

top.title: CHECK LIST
top.text: Set your tasks, create your priority list and never forget any wedding detail.

bottom.title: GUEST LIST
bottom.text: Who is coming? Who is not? Who replied with a 'Maybe'? Manage all of this while customizing your invitations. All in one place and right at your fingertips.

bottom.title: VENDORS
bottom.text: Meet your service providers, view their profiles and make all the perfect choice for your wedding night.

bottom.title: REGISTRY LIST
bottom.text: Escape the awkward moments and receiving the same gift twice by listing everything you've thought of and every store you love. Let your guests choose what to get you for the wedding and say goodbye to unwanted presents.
